__theme_hello_stickynav_desc__: Navigation bar is always visible, even when scrolling down
__theme_hello_maxwidth_desc__: Maximal width of your page in pixel. It automatically shrink in width when screen is smaller, but do not grow over this size.
__theme_hello_fullwidth_desc__: This block will use full screen width and you can set individuall background color, background image or background video over the full width. The inner text however still fit into the defined max page width.
__theme_hello_colorscheme_desc__: Need ideas for new color schemes? Goto: {0} for some fresh ideas.
__theme_hello_colorscheme_primary__: Primary color (Used for text highlights, links, buttons, etc...)
